entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
